about_the_game:
Build Your Own Business Empire!

Business Odyssey is a business simulation game where you start from scratch and become a global giant. Make strategic decisions, grow your company, overcome financial challenges, and surpass your competitors! You'll develop all the skills needed to become a leader in the business world. Master marketing, production, and management processes while seizing opportunities and managing risks effectively.

Company Formation:
Establish your company and take your first steps in the business world.



Business Selection: Make a Difference with Strategy!

Decide which industry to operate in. Create your business plan based on market analysis and competitive conditions. Choosing the right industry is the first step to success!



Production Management:
Analyze your products, launch them on the market, and meet demand!



Shop Expansion and Automation: Continuous Revenue Stream

Expand your shop and automate your operations by hiring more employees. Grow your operations and enjoy generating continuous income. Turn your shop into a money-making machine with strategic investments!



You Set the Path to the Top

Shape the future of your company with every decision. Develop strategies, seize opportunities, and master the complex dynamics of the business world to outsmart your competitors!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: i5 3550 / RYZEN 5 2500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 / AMD R9 270X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: i5 7600K / Ryzen 5 2600x
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: In Business Odyssey, you start with a small capital and aim to build a business empire in the city by deciding which business to start in which shop and deciding the prices. Business Odyssey is a business simulation that will test your business acumen and strategic planning skills.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish, Hindi, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
